Detailed Description

This struct defines the parameters for geomtery of the image
Parameters:
nX number of pixels in image space on X direction
nY number of pixels in image space on Y direction
nZ number of pixels in image space on Z direction
FOV_r radial FOV in voxels
FOV_z axial FOV in voxels
dX pixel separations (mm)
dY pixel separations (mm)
dZ pixel separations (mm)
offsetX distance from center of scanner FOV to center of image in mm
offsetY distance from center of scanner FOV to center of image in mm
offsetZ distance from center of scanner FOV to center of image in mm
scannerDefinitionFile XML file that defines scanner
